title: Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of hosts!
lyrics:
Day is dying in the west;

Heav'n is touching earth with rest;

Wait and worship while the night

Sets her ev'ning lamps alight

Through all the sky.


Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God of hosts!

Heav'n and earth are full of thee!

Heav'n and earth are praising thee,

O Lord Most High.


While the deep'ning shadows fall,

Light of light, on whom we call

Through the glory and the grace

Of the stars that veil thy face,

Our hearts ascend.


And when fading from our sight

Pass the stars, the day, the night,

Lord of Glory, on our eyes

Let eternal morning rise,

And shadows end.
first_line: Day is dying in the west;
